DOC.brief_title: A Study Docetaxel Lobaplatin Versus Docetaxel Carboplatin Combination Regimen Patients With Platinum-sensitive ( > 6 Months ) Relapsed Ovarian Cancer

Recurrence least 6 month receive initial platinumbased chemotherapy without cytoreductive surgery indication . 1 .
